QAPair.Question: What is (are) Ribcage pain ?
QAPair.Answer: Ribcage pain includes any pain or discomfort in the area of the ribs.

QAPair.Question: What to do for Ribcage pain ?
QAPair.Answer: With a broken rib, the pain is worse when bending and twisting the body. This movement does not cause the pain in someone who has pleurisy (swelling of the lining of the lungs) or muscle spasms.

QAPair.Question: What causes Ribcage pain ?
